mapper.select: SELECT a.article_id, a.article_title, d.username AS article_author, b.category_name AS article_category, a.article_time, a.article_content FROM topblog.t_article AS a, topblog.t_category AS b, topblog.t_user_login AS d WHERE a.article_author_id = d.id AND a.article_category_id = b.category_id LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO topblog.t_article ( article_title, article_author_id, article_category_id, article_time, article_content) VALUES ( #{articleEnitiy.articleTitle}, #{articleEnitiy.articleAuthorID}, #{articleEnitiy.articleCategoryID}, #{articleEnitiy.articleTime}, #{articleEnitiy.articleContent})
